name: Fishing For Friends (itch)
description:
Take a boat on the high seas and drop love bombs to befriend fish!

Directions :

arrow keys to move.

space to drop love bombs.

hit fish with love bombs to get them to like you enough to be your friend.

Made for VimJam hosted by 8 bits to infinity.

Jam focus : Collectabes

Theme : There and back

This is my first game but I have made a couple small prototypes but nothing with playable levels. I made all the game art in Inkscape and made the game with the Godot game engine. The sound and music came from twinmusicom.org and freesound.org.

The idea of dropping love bombs was taken from Vimlark's twitch channel. Pixels can't feel pain according to him.

I welcome any constructive criticism.
